title: Curly Hair

verbs: Gives a hairstyle volume and texture.
nouns: A playful and often voluminous hair type.

description: Represents a person with curly hair, often used to describe someone's appearance or hair type. Can also be used to convey a sense of playful or bouncy energy.
apple_vendor_description: Apple's curly hair emoji showcases a vibrant cascade of coils, rendered with exquisite detail and soft, rounded edges that give it a luxurious, organic texture. The realistic lighting on Apple devices catches individual strands, highlighting the volume and springiness of the curls. This emoji is often used to represent diverse hair types or to add a touch of playful flair and personality to digital conversations, embodying individuality and style.
